name: Single Origin
description: Beans sourced from only one farm or region

name: Medium Roast
description: Balanced flavor with medium body and acidity

name: Dark Roast
description: Intense flavor with smoky notes and low acidity

name: Light Roast
description: Bright acidity with floral and fruity notes

name: Natural Process
description: Coffee dried with cherry intact for fruity flavors

name: Washed Process
description: Coffee washed to remove pulp for a clean taste

name: Espresso Blend
description: Specially blended for rich espresso extraction
